page.title: 04WHIMPLE PRIMARY SCHOOL
page.content: School starts at 9.am and finishes at 3.30pm.We have three classes and three full time teachers and one part time teacher. There are 80 pupils in the school.At 10.40am we have a break and go out to play. We come in at 11.am. At 12.pm we have lunch and after we go out to play until 1.15pm.There are two dinner ladies that watch us. We have three rooms,one hall,and one library,one staff room,one television room,and a work are and two offices and a stock room.There are two play grounds,one for the infants and one for the juniors.We have a swimming pool and sometimes school is quite interesting.Some people think theres a school ghost the school ghost is supposed to be Mr.Lewis. He used to live in the school he was our old Head master but its not true. { OR IS {IT......?
